languages.text: {n}Глаза мастера церемоний расширяются.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, помилуйте! И в мыслях не было вызывать ваш гнев! Пустить, эээ, простых людей, говорите? Я посмотрю, что можно сделать!"

{n}The master of ceremonies' eyes widen.{/n} "My sincerest apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! No thought could be further from my mind than incurring your anger! Let the, er, ordinary people through, you say? I'll see what can be done!"
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза мастера церемоний расширяются.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, помилуйте! И в мыслях не было вызывать ваш гнев! Пустить, эээ, простых людей, говорите? Я посмотрю, что можно сделать!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The master of ceremonies' eyes widen.{/n} "My goodness, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! No thought could be further from my mind than incurring your anger! Let the, er, ordinary people through, you say? I'll see what can be done!"

{n}The master of ceremonies' eyes widen.{/n} "My goodness, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! No thought could be further from my mind than incurring your anger! Let the, er, ordinary people through, you say? I'll see what can be done!"

{n}The master of ceremonies' eyes widen.{/n} "My sincerest apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! No thought could be further from my mind than incurring your anger! Let the, er, ordinary people through, you say? I'll see what can be done!"

{n}The master of ceremonies' eyes widen.{/n} "My sincerest apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! No thought could be further from my mind than incurring your anger! Let the, er, ordinary people through, you say? I'll see what can be done!"

{n}The master of ceremonies' eyes widen.{/n} "My sincerest apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! No thought could be further from my mind than incurring your anger! Let the, er, ordinary people through, you say? I'll see what can be done!"

{n}The master of ceremonies' eyes widen.{/n} "My sincerest apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! No thought could be further from my mind than incurring your anger! Let the, er, ordinary people through, you say? I'll see what can be done!"

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des Zeremonienmeisters weiten sich.{/n} "Ich bitte aufrichtig um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Nichts läge mir ferner, als Euren Zorn heraufzubeschwören! Wir sollen die, äh, gewöhnlichen Leute durchlassen, sagt Ihr? Ich werde sehen, was ich tun kann!"
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies' eyes widen.{/n} "My sincerest apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! No thought could be further from my mind than incurring your anger! Let the, er, ordinary people through, you say? I'll see what can be done!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen des Zeremonienmeisters weiten sich.{/n} "Ich bitte aufrichtig um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Nichts läge mir ferner, als Euren Zorn heraufzubeschwören! Wir sollen die, äh, gewöhnlichen Leute durchlassen, sagt Ihr? Ich werde sehen, was ich tun kann!"

languages.text: {n}La maîtresse des cérémonies ouvre de grands yeux.{/n} « Je vous présente mes plus sincères excuses, Votre Seigneurie ! Loin de moi l'idée de vouloir vous offenser ! Vous désirez... euh... qu'on laisse passer les gens ordinaires, dites-vous ? Je vais voir ce qu'il est possible de faire ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies' eyes widen.{/n} "My sincerest apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! No thought could be further from my mind than incurring your anger! Let the, er, ordinary people through, you say? I'll see what can be done!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La maîtresse des cérémonies ouvre de grands yeux.{/n} « Je vous présente mes plus sincères excuses, Votre Seigneurie ! Loin de moi l'idée de vouloir vous offenser ! Vous désirez... euh... qu'on laisse passer les gens ordinaires, dites-vous ? Je vais voir ce qu'il est possible de faire ! »

languages.text: {n}祭仪大师瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“我很抱歉，大人！我不敢再激怒您了！您是希望允许普通人来吗？我来看看该怎么安排一下！”
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies' eyes widen.{/n} "My sincerest apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! No thought could be further from my mind than incurring your anger! Let the, er, ordinary people through, you say? I'll see what can be done!"

traits.locale_text: {n}祭仪大师瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“我很抱歉，大人！我不敢再激怒您了！您是希望允许普通人来吗？我来看看该怎么安排一下！”

languages.text: {n}主催者は目を丸くする。{/n}「心よりお詫び申し上げます、陛下！怒らせるつもりは全くなかったのです！えっと、その…一般市民ですよね？どうにかできないか確認します！」
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies' eyes widen.{/n} "My sincerest apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! No thought could be further from my mind than incurring your anger! Let the, er, ordinary people through, you say? I'll see what can be done!"

traits.locale_text: {n}主催者は目を丸くする。{/n}「心よりお詫び申し上げます、陛下！怒らせるつもりは全くなかったのです！えっと、その…一般市民ですよね？どうにかできないか確認します！」

languages.text: {n}El maestro de ceremonias abre mucho los ojos.{/n} «¡Mis más sinceras disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡No podría desear menos provocar su ira! ¿Dejar pasar a la gente corriente, dice? ¡Veré qué se puede hacer!».
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies' eyes widen.{/n} "My sincerest apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! No thought could be further from my mind than incurring your anger! Let the, er, ordinary people through, you say? I'll see what can be done!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro de ceremonias abre mucho los ojos.{/n} «¡Mis más sinceras disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡No podría desear menos provocar su ira! ¿Dejar pasar a la gente corriente, dice? ¡Veré qué se puede hacer!».

languages.text: {n}Teşrifatçının gözleri hayretle açılıyor.{/n} "Ne olur kusuruma kalmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sizi öfkelendirmeyi aklımdan geçirmeye dahi cüret edemem! Sıradan halkı arzu ediyorsunuz demek. Bizzat ilgileneceğim!"
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies' eyes widen.{/n} "My sincerest apologies, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! No thought could be further from my mind than incurring your anger! Let the, er, ordinary people through, you say? I'll see what can be done!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Teşrifatçı, gözlerini hayretle açıyor.{/n} "Ne olur kusuruma kalmayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sizi öfkelendirmeyi aklımdan geçirmek dahi haddime değil! Sıradan vatandaşları mı arzu ettiniz? Bizzat ilgileneceğim!"
